author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents of various areas including Tondiarpet, Korukkupet and Tolgate met the officials of Chennai Metro Rail Limited and gave their petitions with regard to land acquisition for phase I extension of Chennai Metro Rail project. According to a press release, Chennai Metro Rail has promised compensation that is double the market rate for the lands to be acquired for the project.

CMRL officials met the residents few weeks ago with regard to land acquisition for the project. The phase I extension of the project is from Washermanpet to Wimco Nagar. —staff reporter
title: Residents meet CMRL officials
